Reviews.Title: Acer laptop FAR exceeded my expectations!  I am thrilled to own and use it.  It is the best electronic device I ever bought.
Reviews.Author: richard e stetzel
Reviews.Content: I chose the 5 star rating because it deserves nothing less.  The included apps are mind boggling.  The set up was a breeze.  It is rapid in the search mode and super easy to work with.  I would recommend this highly.  It has more features than I know what to do with.  I will be learning how to use features that my previous computers did not include for a long time.  Buy one!  It has windows 7 which is easy to use.  I tried my sisters laptop with windows 8 and it sucks!  It is not a joke that windows 8 is something to give to someone you hate.

Reviews.Title: Acer Travelmate
Reviews.Author: Winston S Ray
Reviews.Content: great laptop. very happy. nothing else to say on the subject, other than having a mandatory minimum number of words makes me very unlikely to do this again
